mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM ( SELECT p.id, q. HOST HOST, q.APPLICATION_SERVER applicationServer, q.USER_NAME userName, q.DB_USERNAME dbUsername, p.SYS_VERSION sysVersion, q. SUBJECT SUBJECT, q.SYSTEM_TYPE systemType, q.CRONTAB crontab, q.CREATION_DATE createTime, p.EXEC_TIME execTime FROM dc_server_setting q LEFT JOIN dc_distribute_setting p ON q. HOST = p.IP WHERE q.is_delete = 0 ) LEVEL1
mapper.update: UPDATE DC_SERVER_SETTING SSH LEFT JOIN DC_DISTRIBUTE_SETTING DDS ON SSH. HOST = DDS.IP SET SSH.HOST = #{host}, SSH.APPLICATION_SERVER = #{applicationServer}, SSH.USER_NAME = #{userName}, SSH.DB_USERNAME = #{dbUsername}, DDS.SYS_VERSION = #{sysVersion}, SSH.SUBJECT = #{subject}, SSH.SYSTEM_TYPE = #{systemType}, SSH.CRONTAB = #{crontab}, SSH.EXEC_TIME = #{execTime} WHERE DDS.ID = #{id}
